name: mountain-taxes-calculator
description: Interactive state income tax calculator built with TypeScript and Bootstrap

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run type-check && vite build
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run type-check && vite build --mode production
scripts.build:with-lint: npm run clean && npm run type-check && npm run lint && vite build --mode production
scripts.analyze: vite build --mode production && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist/stats.html

author: Mountain Technologies LLC
